caption:
This photograph shows an urban setting focusing on a brick building and its surroundings. The predominant feature is a cluster of spherical, silver street lamps mounted on a dark metal pole, situated in the foreground but slightly left of the center.

On the right side of the image, a figure (presumably a young woman based on the hairstyle and attire) is sitting on a low wall of the brick building, engaging in a leisure activity, possibly reading a book or using a small device. The personâ€™s position appears relaxed and pensively engaged in the activity.

The building itself has a relatively plain and sturdy appearance, characteristic of post-war architecture, with visible details including a rough brick texture and a simple, linear design. A concrete overhang can be seen at the top, suggesting part of a larger structure possibly extending beyond the frame.

Adjacent to the building and to the left in the frame, there is lush green foliage, adding a touch of natural elements contrasting with the urban environment. The overall composition uses natural light, casting soft shadows and highlights, which contribute to a serene and somewhat introspective ambiance in the scene.
title: Cleo Rogers Memorial Library
